unnormalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch of that college fee? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to the rescue! Think of them as your online khazana for educational funding.
normalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch of that college fee? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to the rescue! Think of them as your online khazana for educational funding.

unnormalised: Platforms like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are buzzing with opportunities. Forget endless forms and running around – you can browse scholarships specific to your field, whether you're dreaming of becoming an engineer from IIT Delhi or a doctor from AIIMS.
normalised: Platforms like B U D D Y four Study and Vidya Lakshmi are buzzing with opportunities. Forget endless forms and running around – you can browse scholarships specific to your field, whether you're dreaming of becoming an engineer from I I T Delhi or a doctor from A I I M S.

unnormalised: These portals are simplifying the application process. Many even have filters like caste, community, location so you can find relevant scholarships. The last date for the "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan Scholarship" is 30/06/2024, so hurry! Some awards even offer up to Rs. 50,000!
normalised: These portals are simplifying the application process. Many even have filters like caste, community, location so you can find relevant scholarships. The last date for the "Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan Scholarship" is thirtieth June two thousand and twenty four, so hurry! Some awards even offer up to rupees fifty thousand!

unnormalised: Many portals now offer application support, so if you get stuck, there is help available. Check for offers announced between 10:00 hrs and 14:00 hrs – many schemes are unveiled during that period.
normalised: Many portals now offer application support, so if you get stuck, there is help available. Check for offers announced between ten zero zero hours and fourteen zero zero hours – many schemes are unveiled during that period.

unnormalised: Start your search today! Don't miss out on these golden opportunities. Just a little effort could ease your financial burdens. Get that scholarship and secure your future! Applications can be submitted until 23:59 hrs on 15/07/2024. All the best for your studies, beta!
normalised: Start your search today! Don't miss out on these golden opportunities. Just a little effort could ease your financial burdens. Get that scholarship and secure your future! Applications can be submitted until twenty three fifty nine hours on fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. All the best for your studies, beta!
